BR_text.BRsummary: on_train_end callback is not called if training is stopped early
BR_text.BRdescription:
# early stopping
             met_min_epochs = epoch >= self.min_epochs - 1
             if self.enable_early_stop and (met_min_epochs or self.fast_dev_run):
                 should_stop = self.early_stop_callback.on_epoch_end(epoch=epoch,
                                                                     logs=self.callback_metrics)
                 # stop training
                 stop = should_stop and met_min_epochs
                 if stop:
                     self.main_progress_bar.close()
                     return
 
         self.main_progress_bar.close()
 
         model.on_train_end()
